attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are more Alternative Therapists than qualified Doctors in the UK.They the Doctors.Scared of Opposition.Their system ringfences. The "Info BILL" would enable us patients to verify our personal info and disseminate it amongst different Trusts.Assertain the treatment had thus far,and not waste precious alloted time.I have waited 5 years for the Royal Free to give me Hydrotherapy.They still don't know whats wrong with me.They say I'm normal.St Pancras Hospital "That is a matter for them"The Royal London Homeopathic, excellent treatment.Enough to be able to lean over this computor and type this Petition.It's worth the pain.
1)A simple "accurate and up to date" page of numbers.2)A central patient record dept with FULL INFO (IN FULL)
3)A Full Nutrient Diagnosis on first visit ala USA (cornershop walkins)
4)Hands on manipulation of info(my bad back)Time spent is Global Warming.
PSychologically speaking.Save Trees
